entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.7°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
